createManualEvent(string,string,(string,.details: Creates a new manual resolution event with multiple markets

returns.eventId: The ID of the created event

getAllEventsWithMarkets().details: Returns all events with their underlying markets information

returns.allEvents: Array of all events with their market information

returns.creator: Event creator address
returns.marketIds: Array of market IDs in this event
returns.title: Event title

getEventMarkets(uint256).details: Gets all markets for an event

getEventWithMarkets(uint256).details: Gets a specific event with all its market information

returns.marketInfos: Array of market information for this event

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.newMaxFeePercentage: New max fee percentage in basis points (max 1000 = 10%)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
